title: Sunset Glow
description: Fiery oranges melt into rosy pinks with a grounding aubergine. Perfect for evoking golden-hour warmth.
usageTips: Use the darkest shade for text and the lightest as background to keep contrast high.

title: Ocean Breeze
description: Seafoam and deep teal pair with sandy beige for a serene seaside vibe. Gentle and refreshing.
usageTips: Let teal dominate UI chrome while beige supports as neutral surface.

title: Midnight Neon
description: Electric accents pop against inky blues. Inspired by city lights after dark.
usageTips: Use neons sparingly for CTAs on deep navy backgrounds.

title: Sage Workspace
description: Dusty greens with quiet taupes for a grounded, focused feel. Calm without being bland.
usageTips: Pair sage as primary with taupe surfaces for long-form readability.

title: Candy Pastel
description: Bubblegum hues offer cheerful energy with gentle contrast. Light, sweet, and inviting.
usageTips: Use the deepest lilac for text over blush backgrounds.

title: Mocha Studio
description: Cream, latte, and espresso tones deliver cozy sophistication. Great for lifestyle brands.
usageTips: Keep typography in espresso and let cream breathe as negative space.

title: Aurora Chill
description: Icy blues meet aurora greens for a crisp, futuristic aesthetic. Clean and luminous.
usageTips: Reserve the brightest mint for highlight states and graphs.

title: Burnt Citrus
description: Smoky terracotta with zesty orange accents. Energetic yet grounded.
usageTips: Use terracotta for headers and pale peach for backgrounds.

title: Digital Forest
description: Moss and pine pair with graphite and a neon sap highlight. Nature meets interface.
usageTips: Apply neon sparingly for status chips or success states.

title: Royal Film
description: Regal blues and oxblood create cinematic drama. Luxurious and timeless.
usageTips: Use oxblood for emphasis against the navy canvas.

title: Fresh Matcha
description: Creamy whites and soft greens evoke airy calm. Minimal with a hint of flavor.
usageTips: Keep large surfaces off-white and sprinkle matcha for interactive elements.

title: Cosmic Pop
description: A black canvas with magenta, cyan, and acid yellow bursts. Bold and attention-grabbing.
usageTips: Use black for content frames and rotate brights for CTAs.

title: Library Dust
description: Muted olives and parchment tones suggest heritage and craft. Soft, tactile warmth.
usageTips: Pair parchment backgrounds with olive headings for editorial layouts.

title: Berry Soda
description: Blueberry and raspberry fizz with a cool soda highlight. Playful and punchy.
usageTips: Use the pale blue for cards to soften strong berry accents.

title: Charcoal Mint
description: Graphite grays cooled by crisp mint. Professional with a fresh twist.
usageTips: Lean on charcoal for typography and mint for focus states.

title: Festival Heat
description: Tropical pink, mango, and lime burst against night plum. Energetic and festive.
usageTips: Reserve lime for micro-interactions to avoid fatigue.

title: Slate & Sky
description: Dependable slates paired with airy sky tints. Balanced and trustworthy.
usageTips: Use mid-slate for navigation and sky tints for empty states.

title: Rose Quarry
description: Rose, clay, and stone neutrals feel artisanal and modern. Soft yet substantial.
usageTips: Employ stone as body text on rose-tinted surfaces.

title: Auric Noir
description: Smoky blacks with refined gold accents. Sleek, premium impression.
usageTips: Keep gold for accents like icons and active states only.

title: Lagoon Mist
description: Mist blues and gentle aquas create a spa-like calm. Light and relaxing.
usageTips: Use the deepest teal for actionable elements to maintain clarity.

title: Pumpkin Patch
description: Harvest oranges with moss and wheat for seasonal comfort. Cozy and nostalgic.
usageTips: Let wheat be background and pump up CTAs with pumpkin.

title: Steel Pulse
description: Cool steels with a pulse of cyan. Technical and precise.
usageTips: Use cyan to highlight data points against steel panels.

title: Lavender Dusk
description: Dusky purples glazed with lavender haze. Dreamy yet grounded.
usageTips: Combine deep plum text with lavender cards for soft contrast.

title: Citrus Tech
description: Clean grays with zesty citrus pops feel modern and energetic. Great for dashboards.
usageTips: Use citrus only for KPIs and active controls to guide attention.
